name: mybatis-sql-restore
title: Mybatis Sql Restore
description: 将mybatis日志中的sql日志还原为原始mysql语句并格式化
author: zerlina_ysl

commands.name: restore-mybatis-sql-from-clipboard
commands.title: Restore Mybatis Sql from Clipboard
commands.description: 读取粘贴板中的Mybatis日志，还原为真实SQL并格式化

commands.name: restore-mybatis-sql-from-inputForm
commands.title: Restore Mybatis Sql from Inputform
commands.description: 通过输入框输入Mybatis日志还原为真实SQL并格式化

commands.name: format-sql
commands.title: Format Sql
commands.description: 通过文本框输入SQL语句并直接格式化

commands.name: format-clipboard-sql
commands.title: Format Clipboard Sql
commands.description: 读取粘贴板中的SQL语句并格式剪贴板中的SQL语句

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
